meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bob Braverman Mary Beth Culp Bruce Cox Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1087.

td.p: Bob Braverman, a marketing director from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Mary Beth Culp, an assistant professor originally from Oakland, California
Bruce Cox, an analyst from Lakeside, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $26,650)

tr.td: BRITISH TRIVIA
HATS
BROOKLYN
BRIDGES
RATED "P.G."

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_5', 'clue_J_1_5_stuck', '(Alex: And, uh, we\'re having problems with our audio right now, so I\'m going to take our first commercial break. We\'ll try and repair the difficulties because it\'s making it a bit difficult for you Bruce, we can\'t hear you too well. So we\'ll come back and chat with the players right after this, and repairs.)

Yul Brynner

Bruce
')

tr.td: Bruce
Mary Beth
Bob

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Bruce
Mary Beth
Bob
ARIZONA
AUTHORS
ANATOMY
ACTORS & ROLES
COMPOSERS
(Alex: We ran out of "A"s, so we started with the "C"s.)
COTTON

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Before revealing the clue] This might be a test not only of knowledge but of spelling ability for our 3 players.)

Mary BethWhat is gee whiz
$1,300
BruceWhat is veep????
$2,000
veep')
